title: Honda Motorcycle and Scooter sales rise 27% to 3,17,123 units in December
description: Honda Motorcycle and Scooter India recorded a 27 per cent increase in total sales at 3,17,123 units in December 2023 as compared to 2,50,171 units in the year-ago period. Domestic sales were at 2,86,101 units last month, as compared to 2,33,151 units in December 2022, at a growth of 22.71 per cent, Honda Motorcycle and Scooter India (HMSI) said in a statement.
